title: Khewra Salt Mine
summary: The Khewra Salt Mine (or Mayo Salt Mine) is in Khewra, north of Pind Dadan Khan,[1] an administrative subdivision of Sania District, Punjab Region, Pakistan. The mine is in the Salt Range, Potohar plateau, which rises from the Indo-Gangetic Plain,[2] and is the second largest in the world.â€Š[3][4][5][6]
